The #HimalayaWellnessCompany commemorates the spirit of our country and its ability to stand together during tough times. As we step into our 74th #RepublicDay, let‚Äôs pledge to find strength in our unity & become the nation our forefathers wanted us to be.
#HappyRepublicDay! https://t.co/JvtnEp38O5

Himalaya‚Äôs new manufacturing facility in Tumakuru received the first #ISO certification: EMS (ISO 14001:2015) and OH&S (ISO 45001:2018) from NQA Certification Pvt. Ltd. for effectively implementing and building good #safety culture and practices on the campus. #HimalayaWellness https://t.co/QBnGKDYWZX

Let's celebrate the onset of warmer days and prosperity together and rejoice in the charm of traditions. Himalaya Wellness Company wishes you and your family a very happy Lohri, Pongal, and Makar Sankranti.

#HimalayaWellnessCompany #Lohri #Pongal #MakarSankranti https://t.co/TmUALL0AxR

#Himalaya drives initiatives to enrich lives. We have signed an MoU with the Govt. of Karnataka to rejuvenate Makali's #Government Primary #School with state-of-the-art facilities. We will also support the maintenance of the premises for three years from the completion date. https://t.co/eYxCc3uiEL

@kishnpalchauhan Your experience is a priority and this is not what we want you to feel, Krishn.  We request you to share your complaint & contact details with us at contactus@himalayawellness.com that'd help us connect with you.

Let's bid adieu to 2022 and enter 2023 with new opportunities to evolve, achieve, and flourish. A new year and a stronger commitment to bring Wellness in every Home and Happiness in every Heart!
Himalaya Wellness Company wishes you and your family a very #HappyNewYear! https://t.co/6L2cc0HY9Y

@rlokeshrao @CDSCO_INDIA_INF Hi Lokesh, we always ensure that all our customers have a great experience. We regret the inconvenience caused to you :( We want to investigate this matter and make things right. Please share with us your contact details via DM so we can arrange a call.

‚ÄòTis the season to be merry and spread joy! Himalaya Wellness Company wishes you and your family a #MerryChristmas. May the magic of the holiday season enthrall you with happiness, prosperity, and abundance.

#HimalayaWellness #SeasonsGreetings #Merry #Christmas https://t.co/zkzgmc9oXB

#Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do at Himalaya. As an energy-independent organization, we strive to consume energy through sustainable sources. 

Watch this video on how we focus on path-breaking solutions for a better tomorrow.

Our journey as an Ayurvedic #wellness brand started in the Himalayan foothills 90+ years ago. The support from the Ministry of AYUSH bears testimony to our collaborative effort of making ‚ÄúHar Din Har Ghar Ayurveda‚Äù a reality.
#HimalayaWellness wishes you a #HappyAyurvedaDay. https://t.co/rcz9gb2Knd

Watch the film & tell us what you feel via tweet. Tag @HimalayaIndia and stand a chance to win a specially curated hamper by the Himalaya Wellness Company!
#ContestAlert: Watch the film #SaafHaathSeKhaaiye & tell us what you feel via tweet. Tag @HimalayaIndia and stand a chance to win a specially curated gift hamper by the Himalaya Wellness Company!
